TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ReflectionPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class ReflectionPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class ReflectionPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type ReflectionPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls access to non-public types and members through the APIs.

span.span: Controls access to non-public types and members through the APIs.

summary.span: Controls some features of the APIs.

span.span: Controls some features of the APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不含，程式碼可以使用反映來存取物件的 public 成員。Without , code can use reflection to access only the public members of objects. 設定程式碼適當旗標可以存取`protected`和`private`物件的成員。Code with and the appropriate flags can access the `protected` and `private` members of objects. > [!CAUTION] > 因為可存取非公用類型和成員，我們建議，您不會授與網際網路的程式碼，除非有旗標。Because can provide access to non-public types and members, we recommend that you do not grant to Internet code, except with the flag. 允許存取非公用成員，具有非公用成員的授權集必須等於，限制或存取非公用成員的程式碼的授權集的子集。 allows access to non-public members, with the restriction that the grant set of the non-public members must be equal to, or a subset of, the grant set of the code that accesses the non-public members. 反映的某些功能發出，例如發出偵錯符號，需要與旗標。Certain features of reflection emit, such as emitting debug symbols, require with the flag. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 列舉。For more information, see the enumeration.

returns.span: A copy of the current permission.

span.span: A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求將會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#4)]

Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的使用權限會指定一組完全包含在指定的權限的作業，目前的使用權限是指定的權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示 C:\example.txt 的存取權限是 c： 表示存取權限的子集\\。For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. 如果此方法傳回`true`，目前的權限，表示沒有存取受保護的資源比指定的權限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#2)]

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

param.name: other

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表的權限表示的所有作業的目前權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何通過其中之一權限的需求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
